thread.title: ZRG Partners Expands Consumer Practice with the Addition of Giovanni Lamarca

author: cnbc.com
title: ZRG Partners Expands Consumer Practice with the Addition of Giovanni Lamarca
text:
ROCHELLE PARK, N.J.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- ZRG Partners, recognized as the fastest growing executive search firm in the Americas, is pleased to announce that Giovanni Lamarca has joined ZRG Partners as a managing director and a Consumer Products Sector leader within the growing Consumer Practice. The addition of Giovanni strengthens our strategy and commitment to accelerate our ability to serve a wider range of clients within the dynamic global consumer landscape.
Giovanni is a global citizen, holding multiple nationalities and speaks 6 languages fluently. Prior to joining ZRG Partners, he had a stellar management career within leading global consumer organizations in positions within marketing, innovation and C-suite across 3 continents before entering executive search with Heidrick & Struggles in Europe and in the US. Giovanni has also worked at Korn Ferry and, most recently, in a mid-sized US focused boutique.
Larry Hartmann , CEO of ZRG related, “Giovanni brings a strong global view of the talent opportunities and issues to the consumer practice, having lived and run businesses in Brazil and across Europe during his professional career. Having previously worked with several of our ZRG team members, his ability to partner globally to support key accounts will be seamless and powerful. We are pleased to bring in Giovanni to support and accelerate our growth in the consumer practice.”
Mr. Lamarca stated, “I am motivated to return to a truly global platform which provides the best coverage for my existing and future clients. ZRG’s is an agile and innovating firm, disrupting the executive search markets with game changing technology and, through the use of proprietary relevant data and analytics, is in synchronicity with our modern digital era, substantially enabling clients to make more accurate hiring decisions vs. the traditional search processes. I am also thrilled to reunite with some past colleagues and continue to do great domestic and global work with ZRG, partnering with top companies to unveil the best human capital for their needs.”
About ZRG Partners
ZRG Partners is a progressive mid-sized global executive search firm that uses a proven, data-driven approach. For over 19 years, clients have trusted ZRG Partners to recruit top talent around the world. ZRG Partners is recognized as one of the fastest growing executive search firms in the industry driven by the firm’s client focused, results driven approach grounded in integrity.
